section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by emergency legislation that will expire on October 29, 2023.*
section.heading: Grants.
section.text: Notwithstanding part B of subchapter XII-A of Chapter 3 of Title 1, the Mayor may make grants to nonprofit organizations and other entities to provide services and supports to recent immigrants to the United States arriving in the District.
section.codify:annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of § 4-773.04, see § 104 of Migrant Services and Supports Extension Emergency Amendment Act of 2023 (D.C. Act 25-193, July 27, 2023, 70 DCR 10729).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 104 of Migrant Services and Supports Extension Emergency Amendment Act of 2023 (D.C. Act 25-193, July 27, 2023, 70 DCR 10729).
